WeatherForecast.description: A harmonised description of a Weather Forecast

addressLocality.description: The locality in which the street address is, and which is in the region

addressRegion.description: The region in which the locality is, and which is in the country

district.description: A district is a type of administrative division that, in some countries, is managed by the local government

postOfficeBoxNumber.description: The post office box number for PO box addresses. For example, 03578

streetNr.description: Number identifying a specific property on a public street

relativeHumidity.description: Humidity in the Air. Observed instantaneous relative humidity (water vapour in air)

atmosphericPressure.description: The atmospheric pressure observed measured in Hecto Pascals

gustSpeed.description: A sudden burst of high-speed wind over the observed average wind speed lasting only for a few seconds

illuminance.description: (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Illuminance) observed measured in lux (lx) or lumens per square metre (cd·sr·m−2)

refPointOfInterest.description: Point of interest related to the item

accidentLocation.description: Brief description if the accident took place in a urban or extra-urban area. 0: Regional within the urban area 1: Urban road in the town 2: Provincial road within the town 3: State road within the village 4: Extra-urban road 5: Provincial 6: State road 7: Highway 8: Another way 9: Regional road

alternateName.description: An alternative name for this item

areaServed.description: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

dataProvider.description: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity

dateCreated.description: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

dateIssued.description: The date and time the forecast was issued by the meteorological bureau in ISO8601 UTC format

dateModified.description: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

dateRetrieved.description: The date and time the forecast was retrieved in ISO8601 UTC format

dayMaximum.description: Maximum values for the reported period. Subattributes:- `temperature` : Maximum temperature. See `WeatherForecast.temperature` for description and units. - `feelLikesTemperature`. Maximum feels like temperature. Same semantics and units as `WeatherForecast.feelsLikeTemperature`.-   `relativeHumidity`. Maximum relative humidity. Same semantics and units as `WeatherForecast.relativeHumidity`

relativeHumidity.description: Humidity in the Air. Observed instantaneous relative humidity (water vapour in air)

dayMinimum.description: Minimum values forecasted for the reported period.  Minimum values for the reported period. Subattributes:- `temperature` : Minimum temperature. See `WeatherForecast.temperature` for description and units. - `feelLikesTemperature`. Minimum feels like temperature. Same semantics and units as `WeatherForecast.feelsLikeTemperature`.- `relativeHumidity`. Minimum relative humidity. Same semantics and units as `WeatherForecast.relativeHumidity`

relativeHumidity.description: Humidity in the Air. Observed instantaneous relative humidity (water vapour in air)

anyOf.description: Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Identifier format of any NGSI entity

location.description: Geojson reference to the item. It can be Point, LineString, Polygon, MultiPoint, MultiLineString or MultiPolygon

oneOf.description: Geojson reference to the item. Point
oneOf.title: GeoJSON Point

oneOf.description: Geojson reference to the item. LineString
oneOf.title: GeoJSON LineString

oneOf.description: Geojson reference to the item. Polygon
oneOf.title: GeoJSON Polygon

oneOf.description: Geojson reference to the item. MultiPoint
oneOf.title: GeoJSON MultiPoint

oneOf.description: Geojson reference to the item. MultiLineString
oneOf.title: GeoJSON MultiLineString

oneOf.description: Geojson reference to the item. MultiLineString
oneOf.title: GeoJSON MultiPolygon

owner.description: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

anyOf.description: Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Identifier format of any NGSI entity

seeAlso.description: list of uri pointing to additional resources about the item

source.description: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object

type.description: NGSI Entity type. It has to be WeatherForecast

uVIndexMax.description: The maximum UV index for the period, based on the World Health Organization's UV Index measure. Normative references: [http://www.who.int/uv/intersunprogramme/activities/uv_index/en/](http://www.who.int/uv/intersunprogramme/activities/uv_index/en/)

validFrom.description: Validity period start date and time

validTo.description: Validity period end date and time

validity.description: Includes the validity period for this forecast as a ISO8601 time interval. As a workaround for the lack of support of Orion Context Broker for datetime intervals, it can be used two separate attributes: `validFrom`, `validTo`
